text: Special section ( Hatouk Bazhin) is an Armenian detective drama television series created by Arriva films. The series premiered on Armenia 1 on December 14, 2015 and comprises 16 episodes. Main directors were Edgar Baghdasaryan and Armen Malakyan, second director was Gohar Igityan, director assistants were Gayane Madatyan, Arusik Ghazaryan and Lilith Gabrielyan. Screenwriter was Harutyun Ghukasyan. Most of the series took place in Yerevan, Armenia. ==Series overview== ==Cast and characters== ===Main Cast=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Actor !! Character !! Note (Armenian) |- | Shant Hovhannisyan || Arno Ghazaryan || Գնդապետ, խմբի ղեկավարը |- | Mariam Davtyan || Alla Sevunc || Կապիտան, հոգեբան կրիմինալիստ |- | Babken Chobanyan || Robert Vardanyan || Կապիտան, Մաքսի ընկերը |- | Sepuh Apikyan || Max(im) Melkonyan || Մայոր, խմբի ուժեղ անդամը, Ռոբի ընկերը |- | Vache Ericyan || Armen || Խմբում տեխնիկայի մասնագետը |- | Aleksandr Badalyan || Hrayr Levonich || Պաթոլոգոանատոմ կրիմինալիստ |} ===Recurring Cast=== *Arman Ghazaryan *Ani Khachikyan *Armen Margaryan *Saten Hazaryan *Tigran Mnacakanyan *Levs Davtyan *Ishkhan Gharibyan ==References== ==External links== * Category:Armenian- language television shows Category:Armenian drama television series Category:2014 Armenian television series debuts Category:2010s Armenian television series Category:2015 Armenian television series endings
title: Special section (Armenian TV series)
